name: Offroad Bike Race Pro Adventure 2016 – Motocross Driving Simulator with Dirt Tracking and Racing Stunt for Pro Champions
name_original: Offroad Bike Race Pro Adventure 2016 – Motocross Driving Simulator with Dirt Tracking and Racing Stunt for Pro Champions
description:
Welcome to the Ultimate Offroad bike adventure of 2016. Adventurous bike riders play the thrilling offroad motorbike racing in the newest offroad legends game. This offroad bike rider adventure is specially designed for motorcycle games lover.

Motocycle Offroad driving adventure fans of 2016, get set to take your Offroad bike through the most thrilling terrain ride. Experience the thrilling twists and turns of the climb in the Offroad Bike 2016 Adventure game. Have fun with the latest driving adventure motor bike racing games and 4x4 off road games. . Can you emerge as the best hill climb driver 3d at the latest motor bike hill driving game? Choose your favorite Motor Bike in this hill climb offroad legends game and drive it through the off-road rugged terrain on a secluded, hilly island. Incur dirt bike damage by flipping your bike.

Make your way safely and quickly through each obstacle course and reach to the finishing point. Enjoy hours of nonstop fun in each off-road moto bike hill driving level of this 4x4 OFFROAD BIKE DRIVING ADVENTURE 2016 game.

FEATURES:
1. Renegade 10 level riding challenge.
2. Realistic and smooth controls of the 3D motorbike
3. Wild roadless off-road environment.
4. Speed off with NO restrictions NO Traffic rider/violators
5. Tricky and dangerous driving rugged paths
6. Display real hill racing skills.
7. Perform hill bike stunts in the crazy racing against the time.

Become the ultimate rider! Do the latest 2016 hill bike stunts and
moto racing in the challenging bike racing OFFROAD BIKE DRIVING ADVENTURE 2016.
